tool_description: an easy-to-use API of Microsoft Edge TTS.
name: Microsoft Edge Text to Speech
title: Microsoft Edge Text to Speech

api_list.name: GetDownloadURL
api_list.description:
request with a long text and get the mp3 download URL created by the TTS engine.

Supporting lots of languages with different voices, such as French, Spanish, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Polish, Hindi and so on

params:
text - STRING : the text to be transformed to speeches.
voice_name - STRING: the voice and language for the speeches.

api_list.name: GetVoicesList
api_list.description: Voices list for the param "voice_name" of the function "GetDownloadUrl"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://microsoft-edge-text-to-speech.p.rapidapi.com/TTS/VoicesList"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "microsoft-edge-text-to-speech.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://microsoft-edge-text-to-speech.p.rapidapi.com/TTS/VoicesList"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "microsoft-edge-text-to-speech.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
